description:
The 69th annual Emmy Awards took place last night, and while only a few lucky recipients went home with Emmy statuettes, all of the presenters and nominees were offered access to a "Giving Suite".第六十九届艾美奖颁奖典礼已于昨晚举行，虽然只有几位幸运儿赢得了艾美奖杯，但所有的颁奖人和被提名者都收到了一份“大礼包”。

The items in the Giving Suite include:大礼包里有：

A Kombucha Cleanse–A slowly fermented beverage made from black or green tea bacteria, sugar, and yeast. These active ingredients help cleanse the body of waste and toxins more efficiently, thus boosting its ability to burn and eliminate fat.康普茶——用红茶菌或绿茶菌、糖和酵母缓慢发酵制成的一种饮料。这种活性成分能更有效地清除体内的废弃物和毒素，从而增强自身燃脂、消脂的能力。

An Infinity Membership to the Exclusive Traveler Club–ETC is a members club in the seven Catalonia five-star resorts. The Infinity Membership includes five years of membership, five free nights at the Catalonia Royal Bavaro, a couple's massage, personal trainer services, in-room BBQ, and dinner in a "top-class" restaurant outside the resort, along with other services.专属旅行俱乐部无限会员——专属旅行俱乐部（ETC）是七个加泰罗尼亚五星级度假区里的一个会员俱乐部。这张无限会员卡包含五年的会员资格、在加泰罗尼亚皇家巴瓦罗酒店免费住五晚、双人按摩服务、私人健身教练服务、室内烧烤、在度假区外的“顶级”餐馆享用晚餐以及其他服务。

Ferrari Trento Wine法拉利特伦托葡萄酒

IZUMIO Hydrogen-Infused Water–A high-quality, natural water infused with hydrogen from the countryside of Japan, which provides antioxidative benefits.活美水素水（氢气水）——来自日本乡村含有氢气的高质量的天然水，有抗氧化的功效。

Suzhou Tourism–An experimental package that includes a luxurious silk robe from Xiu Niang Silk and a two-night stay within a Regency Suite at the prestigious Hyatt Regency Suzhou.苏州观光——一份苏州观光体验礼包，其中包括一件绣娘丝绸出品的奢华丝质长袍，而且还可以在著名的苏州凯悦酒店行政套房住两晚。

Vuzix iWear Video HeadphonesVuzix iWear视频耳机（Vuzix是美国一家智能设备厂商）

WOLVERINE ShoesWOLVERINE鞋子（WOLVERINE是美国历史最悠久的制鞋企业）

Celebrities also received:明星们还收到了：

Canyon Ranch Gift Certificate–A three-night, all-inclusive, integrative stay for two (sharing accommodations) at Canyon Ranch in Tucson, Arizona or Canyon Ranch in Lenox, Massachusetts.峡谷牧场礼券——可供两人（双人间）在马萨诸塞州雷诺克斯市、图森或亚利桑那州的峡谷牧场住三晚，还可享受全套一体化的服务

Benjamin Steakhouse Prime gift certificate–Serving only the best USDA prime steaks, succulent seafood and more from the grill本杰明牛排馆一级礼券——只提供通过美国农业部认证的最好的牛排、鲜美多汁的海鲜和烧烤食品

DELSEY Luggage法国大使牌行李箱

ABCmouse.com Early Learning Academy –The leading digital learning resource for children ages two to eight is available on computers, tablets, and smartphones, with more than 8,500 engaging activities. The ABCmouse gift set includes a one-year membership, a DVD and a set of five hardcover books.ABCmouse早教课程（ABCmouse是美国知名线上幼教品牌）——为两到八岁的儿童提供的领先的数字化学习资源，可通过台式电脑、平板电脑和智能手机参与8500多项有趣的活动（早教课程）。ABCmouse礼包里有一年的会员资格、一张DVD和五本（一套）精装书籍。

Adult Swim's Rick and Morty Graphic Knit SweaterAdult Swim推出的印有瑞克与莫蒂图案的针织衫（Adult Swim是美国一个以成人为对象的动画频道，《瑞克与莫蒂》是一部动画科幻情景喜剧）

Haircare Products–The selection includes INTENSITY 30 Second Treatment, Heat Protectant Spray, and ALL DAY TAME Smoothing Balm.美发产品——这套礼品里有30秒强效头发护理产品、防热保护喷雾以及可使头发全天候柔顺的润发膏

Freeman Beauty Clay Mask–This serum-infused clay mask instantly clears pores with activated Charcoal to gently draws out oils and toxins without over-drying.弗里曼美容面膜泥——这款含有精华液的面膜泥可以通过活性炭快速疏通毛孔，温和地清除油分和毒素，且不会使面部过于干燥。

InvitationConsultants.com Cards–15 Custom Heavyweight Thank You Cards.Invitation Consultants.com卡片（Invitation Consultants是一家礼品店）——15张定制加厚款致谢卡

Masana Portrait Artwork–You'll be treated to a private portrait sitting in Masana's studio in New York City's Hotel Elysée.马萨纳肖像作品——马萨纳将会在纽约爱丽舍酒店的工作室中为您画一幅肖像作品。

Treasure soy Candles大豆蜡烛珍品

Patchi Chocolate Gift Box黎巴嫩巧克力礼盒

Scrumptious Sandwiches, Salads, and Snacks Book制作美味三明治、沙拉和小吃的书籍

Thera Cane Massager–An amazingly simple yet effective self-massager: Treat yourself to deep relief from painful, knotted, spasmed muscles.Thera Cane按摩器（Thera Cane是美国一家生产按摩杖的公司）——由自己操控的一款非常简单却有效的按摩器

Sleeptracker Monitor–A suite of sleep tools designed for your deepest, most restorative sleep, and you can receive daily sleep analytics and personalized coaching.睡眠跟踪器——为您的深度恢复性睡眠设计的一套睡眠工具，而且你每天都可以收到睡眠分析数据和个性化指导

（翻译：Dlacus）

title: 中国元素现身2017艾美奖，丝绸成伴手礼

description:
Tattoos can cause cancer and mutations - and one colour is potentially more toxic than others, according to scientists.纹身会致癌，导致基因变异。科学家说，一种纹身的颜色可能毒性更大。

Research by the European Chemicals Agency to be published imminently is investigating possible risks associated with being inked.欧洲化学组织（European Chemicals Agency）正在研究纹身会带来的各种风险，结果将于近日发布。

The agency said: “Many reports show significant concerns for public health stemming from the composition of inks used for tattooing.该机构表示：“很多报告都显示，用于纹身的各种墨水会带来健康隐患。”

“The most severe concerns are allergies caused by the substances in the inks and possible carcinogenic, mutagenic or reproductively toxic effects.”“最严重的隐患在于墨水中有成分会引起过敏，还可能致癌、基因突变或反复发作的中毒症状。”

Inks are not currently regulated in the EU. If any particular chemicals are found to be harmful as thought, they will be banned.墨水目前并未在欧盟受到管控。其中如果出现任何有害物质都会被严令禁止。

An agency spokesman said: "If it is found that a restriction is needed, a formal proposal to restrict the substances will be submitted within one year to initiate the process."机构发言人说：“如果需要管控，一年内就会启动相关管理程序。”

Red ink has been linked to dermatitis - swelling and soreness - due to it containing mercury sulphide.红墨水与皮炎、红肿和酸痛总是脱不开关系，红墨水中含有硫化汞。

Meanwhile red, blue, green and purple ones are more likely to cause granulomas – little ridges of bumps on the skin.同时，红、蓝、绿、紫墨水都有可能导致肉芽肿，也就是说皮肤上会出现很多小肿块。

The public will be asked to contribute to the research. The NHS has also warned of the dangers of 'black'or 'neutral' henna.研究需要公众参与。英国国家医疗服务体系（NHS）同样警告黑色和偏灰色的染色剂也有问题。

Different to authentic henna, which is orange in colour, this darker substance it may contain levels of a chemical dye 'so powerful and toxic that it is illegal to use it on the skin'.橘色染色剂受到了权威认证，但是深色物质内部可能含有毒性更大的化学物质，在皮肤上使用是违法的。

The NHS warned: “If you see a shop or stall offering to paint black tattoos onto your skin, don’t be tempted to get one. It could leave you scarred for life and put you at risk of a life-threatening allergic reaction.”英国国家医疗服务体系发出警告：“如果在商店或者路边摊看到能做黑色纹身，千万别尝试。这种纹身存在使人终身过敏的威胁，非常可怕。”

Anyone suffering an allergic reaction should contact a doctor as soon as possible.任何患有过敏反应的人都应该尽快去医院。

（翻译：阿忙）
